column4: I got a bluetooth fob/dongle/usbstick for christmas, but when I put it into my computer running ubuntu studio the little blue icon didn't appear in my menu bar. how can I get it back?
right click onthe panel and hit 'add' and add the notification area
there is the one at the top, i havn't changed it yet
ok, so right click on it and choose add to panel, then choose notification area
I have the notification pannel, but there is no icon there
there is no bluetooth preferences there...
I put a netstatus applet there, but there is no bluetooth...
you want the bluetooth icon, or the wireless icon? maybe try nm-applet --sm-disable
is it turned on? Is this a laptop?
it is a desktop, an older one
it is on tho, it worked off the live cd
goto System | Preferences | Bluetooth | General tab and see what the settings are
I have to go, but no, there is no bluetooth under system preferences
